review_title: Relaxed atmosphere, high caliber coworkers and what a view!
pros: Located in an idyllic area of Nottingham, right next to the river, there is never a bad view. The people there are extremely friendly and relaxed whilst maintaining a high level of achievement. If you are a dog lover, you'll also enjoy the resident pups running around or trailing after the owners/founders.
cons: While the location is absolutely stunning, it does take a bit to get there and isn't terribly convenient for someone without a car.
